sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import profilePic from './assets/profile.jpg'; import './index.css'; const App = () => { const [showCerts, setShowCerts] = useState(false); const [zoomImage, setZoomImage] = useState(null); const mainRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const handleKeyDown = (e) => { if (!mainRef.current) return; if (e.key === 'ArrowRight') { mainRef.current.scrollBy({ left: window.innerWidth, behavior: 'smooth' }); } else if (e.key === 'ArrowLeft') { mainRef.current.scrollBy({ left: -window.innerWidth, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown); return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown); }, []); return (
{/* üîπ Bio Slide */}

Saikrishna Badiger

"Turning data into decisions | Code into creations"

Aspiring Data Analyst | Cloud | DevOps | Web

üöÄ Open to Work & Internships

üëâ Swipe or use ‚¨ÖÔ∏è‚û°Ô∏è keys

Email GitHub LinkedIn

üì© Click on the Gmail link to connect directly ‚Äî I'm always open to opportunities and meaningful conversations!

üìÑ Download Resume
{/* üîπ About Slide */}

About Me

I‚Äôm a passionate Computer Science student (2022‚Äì2026) at Adichunchanagiri Institute of Technology with strong foundations in Java, Python, Data Structures, and Web Development.

I enjoy building real-world software, solving complex problems, and constantly learning new tools ‚Äî especially in the fields of Cloud, DevOps, and Machine Learning.

I‚Äôm seeking exciting opportunities where I can grow as a Data Analyst or Software Developer, contribute to impactful projects, and collaborate in dynamic teams.

What sets me apart is my curiosity-driven learning and hands-on experience building end-to-end projects.

{/* üîπ Skills Slide */}

Skills

{/* Technical Skills */}

Technical Skills

  • Java, Python, C++, C
  • DSA
  • HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • MySQL
  • OpenStack, GCP
  • GitHub, Linux
  • VS Code, LaTeX
{/* Soft Skills */}

Soft Skills

  • Communication
  • Teamwork
  • Problem-Solving
  • Adaptability
  • Time Management
  • Presentation Skills
{/* üîπ Projects Slide */}

Projects

üß† Brain Tumor Classification

ResNet50-based classification of MRI images.

Python, TensorFlow, OpenCV

GitHub

üìå Status: In Progress

üè° Homestay Management System

Eco-friendly homestay booking system.

HTML, CSS, JS, MySQL (XAMPP)

üìå Status: Completed

üìö Quiz Web Application

Quiz platform with learning and part-time job features.

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python (Django)

üìå Status: Completed

{/* üîπ Certifications Slide */}

Certifications

  • Programming in Java Certification by NPTEL - 2025
  • Machine Learning Certification by NPTEL ‚Äì 2025
  • Frontend Developer Certification ‚Äì Great Learning ‚Äì 2024
  • Hackathon Participation ‚Äì 2024‚Äì2025
  • IEEE Conference Volunteer Certificate ‚Äì 2024
{showCerts && (
{[ 'ieee-volunteer.jpg', 'nptel-java.jpg', 'nptel-ml.jpg', 'hackathon-ait.jpg', 'hackathon-team-vortex.jpg', 'frontend-css.jpg' ].map((img, i) => ( setZoomImage(`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/certifications/${img}`)} className="cursor-zoom-in rounded shadow-md w-full h-64 object-contain bg-white p-2" /> ))}
)}
{/* üîπ Contact Slide */}

Contact

üìß Email: vishwakarmasaikrishna@gmail.com

üîó GitHub: github.com/sai-krishna26

üîó LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/saikrishna-badiger-063a9a314

{/* achievements section */}

Achievements

  • üèÜ Successfully built and presented a deep learning project on Brain Tumor Classification using ResNet50 as part of final year academic work.
  • üß† Participated in inter-college Hackathons and contributed to innovative project ideas and team collaboration.
  • ü§ù Volunteered at IEEE International Conference 2024, assisting with event coordination and tech support.
  • üìú Earned certifications in Java, Machine Learning, and Frontend Development from NPTEL and Great Learning.
  • üåê Developed and deployed a portfolio website showcasing skills, projects, and certifications using React and GitHub Pages.
{/* üîç Zoom Modal */} {zoomImage && (
setZoomImage(null)} >
)}

); }; export default App;
